original_text: What, after all, is Apollos? And what is Paul? Only servants, through whom you came to believe—as the Lord has assigned to each his task.
korean_text: 그런즉 아볼로는 무엇이며 바울은 무엇이냐 그들은 주께서 각각 주신 대로 너희로 하여금 믿게 한 사역자들이니라

sentences.original_text: through whom you came to believe
as the Lord has assigned to each his task
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 각각 자기의 과업을 맡겨주신 것처럼
